string.text:
A luxury installation not often seen in the Zone. Although it does not offer any protection against mutants or hostile stalkers, it can provide a brief respite against the hostilities of the Zone. This one appears to have many music sheets of varying difficulty and a number of synthetic-sounding instruments.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
